title: PyCon Cleveland 2018
summary: Meet the Anaconda team at PyCon 2018! Taking place this year in Cleveland on May 11-13, PyCon is the largest annual gathering for the community using and developing the open-source Python programming language.

title: Strata London 2018
summary: Meet the Anaconda team at Strata London! We'll be joining experts from around the world on May 21-24 to discuss compelling data science case studies, best practices, and new analytic approaches.

title: Strata NYC 2018
summary: Headed to Strata NYC? So are we! Join Anaconda Senior Solutions Architect James Bednar for a tutorial on "Making Interactive Browser-Based Visualizations Easy in Python." While Python lets you solve data-science problems by stitching together packages from the Python ecosystem, it can be difficult to assemble the right tools to solve real-world problems. James will demonstrate how to use the 15+ packages covered by the new PyViz.org initiative to make it simple to build interactive plots and dashboards, even for large, streaming, and highly multidimensional data.
